languages.text: {n}Плавно и тихо гибкая фигура эльдарки выходит вперед.{/n} "Если того желает трибунал — моя речь разольется рекой и смоет ваши сомнения. В покоях Вольного Торговца я обнаружила осколок своего дома. Целый мир-корабль, сгинувший во тьме меж звезд, и единственная зацепка была в руках {mf|этого|этой} мон-кай. Тогда я и заподозрила, что к бедам, постигшим мой Крударах, причаст{mf|ен|на} именно {mf|он|она}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Плавно и тихо гибкая фигура эльдарки выходит вперед.{/n} "Если того желает трибунал — моя речь разольется рекой и смоет ваши сомнения. В покоях Вольного Торговца я обнаружила осколок своего дома. Целый мир-корабль, сгинувший во тьме меж звезд, и единственная зацепка была в руках {mf|этого|этой} мон-кай. Тогда я и заподозрила, что к бедам, постигшим мой Кударах, причаст{mf|ен|на} именно {mf|он|она}".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet s'avance avec grâce.{/n} « Si la cour me le permet, mes propos couleront comme une rivière et emporteront vos doutes. J'ai trouvé un éclat provenant de mon foyer dans les appartements {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Un vaisseau-monde tout entier a disparu parmi les étoiles, et le seul indice quant à son destin se trouvait entre les mains de {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh. Il ne m'en fallut pas plus pour commencer à soupçonner qu'{mf|il|elle} avait quelque chose à voir avec le destin tragique de Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

Un vaisseau-monde tout entier a disparu parmi les étoiles, et le seul indice quant à son destin se trouvait entre les mains de {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh. Il ne m'en fallut pas plus pour commencer à soupçonner qu'{mf|il|elle} avait quelque chose à voir avec le destin tragique de Crudarach. »

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地向前迈了一步。{/n}“如果法庭允许的话，我的发言将会像河流一样奔涌，洗清所有人的一切疑虑。我在行商浪人的房间中发现了我的故乡的碎片。我的方舟世界凭空消失在了星际之中，唯一与命运相关的线索，就掌握在这个猴子手上。就是这个时候，我怀疑克鲁达拉赫遭遇的灾难与{mf|他|她}息息相关。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地向前迈了一步。{/n}“如果法庭允许的话，我的发言将会像河流一样奔涌，洗清所有人的一切疑虑。我在行商浪人的房间中发现了我的故乡的碎片。我的方舟世界凭空消失在了星际之中，唯一与命运相关的线索，就掌握在这个猴子手上。就是这个时候，我怀疑克鲁达拉赫遭遇的灾难与{mf|他|她}息息相关。”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは静かに一歩を踏み出した。{/n}「本法廷がお望みなら、清流のごとき私の発言が、あなた方の疑念を洗い流すだろう。私はローグトレーダーの部屋で、私の故郷の破片を見つけた。星々の中に消え去った方舟の運命を知る唯一の手がかりは、このモン＝ケイの手中にあったのだ。その時に私は、{mf|彼|彼女}がクルダラに降りかかった不幸と何か関係があるのではないかと疑い始めた」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは静かに一歩を踏み出した。{/n}「本法廷がお望みなら、清流のごとき私の発言が、あなた方の疑念を洗い流すだろう。私はローグトレーダーの部屋で、私の故郷の破片を見つけた。星々の中に消え去った方舟の運命を知る唯一の手がかりは、このモン＝ケイの手中にあったのだ。その時に私は、{mf|彼|彼女}がクルダラに降りかかった不幸と何か関係があるのではないかと疑い始めた」

languages.text: {n}Schweigend und graziös geht Yrliet einen Schritt nach vorn.{/n} "Wenn es der Hof so wünscht, wird meine Rede zu einem fließenden Fluss, der all Eure Zweifel fortwäscht. Ich fand einen Splitter meiner Heimat in den Gemächern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. In den Sternen verschwand ein komplettes Weltenschiff und der einzige Hinweis auf dessen Schicksal ruhte in den Händen {mf|dieses|dieser} Chem-Pan-Sey. Das war der Moment, als ich anfing zu erahnen, dass {mf|er|sie} irgendwie mit dem Unglück meines Crudarachs in Verbindung stehen musste."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schweigend und graziös geht Yrliet einen Schritt nach vorn.{/n} "Wenn es der Hof so wünscht, wird meine Rede zu einem fließenden Fluss, der all Eure Zweifel fortwäscht. Ich fand einen Splitter meiner Heimat in den Gemächern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. In den Sternen verschwand ein komplettes Weltenschiff und der einzige Hinweis auf dessen Schicksal ruhte in den Händen {mf|dieses|dieser} Chem-Pan-Sey. Das war der Moment, als ich anfing zu erahnen, dass {mf|er|sie} irgendwie mit dem Unglück meines Crudarachs in Verbindung stehen musste."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet da un silencioso y grácil paso al frente.{/n} «Con la venia, mi testimonio fluirá como un río que arrastrará las dudas del tribunal. Hallé un fragmento de mi hogar en las estancias {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Un mundo astronave entero desapareció en las estrellas, y la única pista sobre su destino estaba en poder de {mf|este|esta} mon-keigh. Fue entonces cuando empecé a sospechar que había tenido algo que ver con la calamidad que cayó sobre mi Crudarach».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

Hallé un fragmento de mi hogar en las estancias {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Un mundo astronave entero desapareció en las estrellas, y la única pista sobre su destino estaba en poder de {mf|este|esta} mon-keigh. Fue entonces cuando empecé a sospechar que había tenido algo que ver con la calamidad que cayó sobre mi Crudarach».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, ileri doğru sessiz ve zarif bir adım atıyor.{/n} "Divanın arzusu buysa konuşmam, su gibi akacak ve her türlü şüpheyi temizleyecektir. Hür Tacir'in odasında yuvamdan bir parça buldum. Bütün bir gemidünya, yıldızların arasında kaybolmuştu. Ona ne olduğuna dair tek ipucu da bu mon-keigh'in ellerinde idi. Kendisinin, Crudarach'ımın başına gelen talihsizlikle bir ilgisi olduğuna dair şüphelerim o an başladı."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet silently takes a graceful step forward.{/n} "If the court so desires, my speech will run like a river and wash away your doubts. I found a shard of my home in the Rogue Trader's chambers. An entire craftworld vanished among the stars, the only clue to its fate resting in the hands of this mon-keigh. That was when I began to suspect that {mf|he|she} had something to do with the misfortune that had befallen my Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ileri doğru sessiz ve zarif bir adım atıyor.{/n} "Divanın arzusu buysa, konuşmam nehir gibi akacak ve her türlü şüpheyi temizleyecektir. Hür Tacir'in odasında yuvamın bir parçasını buldum. Bütün bir gemidünya yıldızların arasında kaybolmuştu ve ona ne olduğuna dair tek ipucu, bu mon-keigh'in ellerinde idi. Kendisinin, Crudarach'ımın başına gelen talihsizlikle bir ilgisi olduğuna dair şüphelerim o an başladı."
